page.description: Any grid you build in Alpha Five Version 10 contains a built-in HTML editor for editing rich memo fields. This [video] demonstrates how rich memos can be edited in the grid part and the detail view part.

section.description: In the grid section, the HTML editor is configured as a popup editor. It's opened when you click on the field. And in the detail view, the HTML editor can be configured to edit "in-place." Have a look at this video to see it in action.
